Tonase

(妻(母)戸無瀬) (Tsuma (Haha) Tonase)

Authority Control:
December 1976 Program; Kabuki tojo jinbutsu jiten (Tokyo: Hakusuisha, 2006)

Plays:

The League of the 47 Ronin (仮名手本忠臣蔵)

The Bridal Journey (道行旅路の嫁入)
